text: Lewis Freestone (born 26 October 1999) is an English professional footballer who plays for Cheltenham Town as a defender. ==Career== ===Peterborough United=== He started his football career with Peterborough United and made his league debut on 14 April 2017 in a 2–1 defeat against Fleetwood Town in the Football League One. ====Bedford Town (loan)==== On 4 January 2019 Freestone was loaned out to Bedford Town for a month.Three Peterborough United players leave the club on loan, peterboroughtoday.co.uk, 4 January 2019 ====Back to Peterborough==== He was released by Peterborough United at the end of the 2018–19 season. ===Brighton & Hove Albion=== On 29 July 2019 Freestone signed a one-year contract with the Under-23 development squad at Premier League side Brighton & Hove Albion.
